title: iResizer 3.0 – Scale images without diminishing key picture elements
content: iResizer scale an image without changing important visual content such as people, buildings, animals, etc. While normal resizing affects all pixels uniformly when scaling an image, iResizer resizing mostly affects pixels in areas that do not have important visual content.   iResizer lets you: Fit entire photos on Instagram without cropping Remove objects from photos […]

title: System Monitor 2.7 – Activity monitor from the maker of TinkerTool
content: System Monitor is an application for the menu bar of OS X, designed to inform you unobtrusively about the activity of your computer.
